resources.string:
Your use of this application is governed by: 
 
 a) Company's Terms of Service (http://company.com/intl/en/policies/terms/) 
 b) Company's Privacy Policy (http://company.com/intl/en/policies/privacy/) 
 c) All applicable terms of service and privacy policies related to the Google+ Sign-In (used for authenticating the user and obtaining his/her profile data) and Google Analytics (for identifying the app usage patterns).


Company's terms of service and privacy policies may be updated from time to time and without notice.


By using the app, you agree to the use of your data in accordance with Company's Privacy Policy.
